name: GoodMem DevContainer
postCreateCommand:
bash -lc 'set -e; printf "#!/usr/bin/env bash
exit 0
" | sudo tee /usr/local/bin/docker >/dev/null; sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker; curl https://get.goodmem.ai | bash -s -- --debug-install --no-openai-embedder-registration || true; sudo rm -f /usr/local/bin/docker; cd ${containerWorkspaceFolder}; printf "OPENAI_API_KEY=your_openai_api_key_here
ADD_API_KEY=your_goodmem_api_key_here
" > .env && echo ".env file created - installer ran without pulling images"'
